dict.acceptation: 硬币；金属钱币；[建筑]拐角，墙角石；

sent.orig: SPUN Starring Morgan Strebler-The ultimate FLOATING COIN with the world most impossible COIN BEND.
sent.trans: 终极悬浮硬币和最难以置信的硬币弯曲。

sent.orig: The coin is minted by Shenyang Mint and solely distributed by China Gold Coin Incorporation.
sent.trans: 该纪念金币由沈阳造币厂铸造，中国金币总公司总经销。

sent.orig: Among the Joker effects available are: 'Chinese Coin a coin is magically bent.
sent.trans: 最近说笑话者魔术发布了一定数量的中国人硬币作用。

sent.orig: Coin collecting is interesting,but you find a real valuable coin only once in a blue moon.
sent.trans: 硬币收藏很有趣，不过得到一个真正有价值的货币几乎是不可能的。

sent.orig: The bi-metal 50 Schilling coin shows three versions of the 1 Schilling coin throughout its history.
sent.trans: 这枚双金属50先令硬币反映的是1先令硬币在其整个历史上的三个版本。
